price: Yanã sanin* abin da ke a gaba gare su da abin da ke bãyansu, kuma bã su kẽwayẽwa da shi ga sani.
arabic: يَعۡلَمُ مَا بَيۡنَ أَيۡدِيهِمۡ وَمَا خَلۡفَهُمۡ وَلَا يُحِيطُونَ بِهِۦ عِلۡمٗا
footnotes: * Allah Ya san kõme ga halittunsa, su kuwa bã su iya kewayewa da sanin kõme game da shi.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: yaʿlamu mā bayna aydīhim wamā khalfahum walā yuḥīṭūna bihi ʿil'man
